faculty.Research Interests:
Nanostructure based haptics sensors, gas sensors: Study of charge carrier transport properties.
Integration of artificial intelligence (AI) in various sensors: Analyzing Sensor response with the help of AI, machine learning algorithms, and artificial neural networks.
Organic/inorganic field effect transistor and diodes: High band gap semiconductors, organic semiconductors, charge carrier transport study, and effect of trap sites. Effect of molecular arrangement on charge carrier transport and traps.
Device trap density measurement with the help of capacitance measurements.
Energy generation and storage devices: Study the effect of molecular and atomic arrangement on the performance of energy storage devices.
Piezoelectric sensors: Study various piezoelectric materials in thin films and nano-structured forms.

Select Recent Publications.title: Seedless Hydrothermal Growth of ZnO Nanorods as a Promising Route for Flexible Tactile Sensors
Hydrothermally Grown ZnO Nanorods as Promising Materials for Low Cost Electronic Skin
Carrier-induced Hopping to Band conduction in pentacene
Charge transport mechanism in copper phthalocyanine thin films with and without traps
Mixed Phases as a Route to Self-passivation: The Effect of π-Stacking Backbone on the Physical and Electrical Properties of Naphthalenediimide Derivatives

faculty.Research Interests: Experimental Active Matter, Living Matter, Soft Condensed Matter, Statistical Physics, Biological Physics
Experimental and theoretical aspects of Nanophotonics and 2D materials.

Developed Devices/Instruments.Name: geo-BHUMI
Developed Devices/Instruments.Working Area: Soil Temperature and Microclimates measurement, i.e., Nitrogen (N), phosphorus (P) and potassium (K), including Air Humidity and Air Temperature.

Developed Devices/Instruments.Name: Fiber optics-based point-of-care (POC) device for detecting water-borne Escherichia coli (E. coli).
Developed Devices/Instruments.Working Area: This device was developed for Indian Navy personnel to monitor the drinking water quality that reduces major water-borne infections.
